snippet: Broncos Coach John Fox was resting at his 0ff-season home in Charlotte, N.C., after having heart surgery.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos coach John Fox is released from hospital, four days after having successful heart surgery; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Broncos Coach John Fox was resting at his 0ff-season home in Charlotte, N.C., after having heart surgery.

headline.main: Fox Is Home After Having Operation On Heart
headline.print_headline: Fox Is Home After Having Operation On Heart
